title: Ngai teh Kalvaria i lungngaih niah khan
lyrics:
Ngai teh, Kalvaria i lungngaih niah khan,
Hmelma chhiar sen lohte an pung khawm e;
Tu nge i lungngaihna chhiar duh?
Van chhumten nangmah an bawm che,
Kalvari an lo hliap.

Amen, Amen, Haleluia, Amen!
Lei leh vanten Amen rem se;
Tuifinriat leh khawvel zawng hian,
Halelui nawn rawh se.

Ngai teh, thihna hneh zovin a tho leh ta;
Thihna suna khawpui hlim ngai lo kha,
Kalvari par lawmin an leng,
Tuarna sunin hnehna an lawm,
Buaina a awm tawh lo.

Thihna lui ralah, aw, Salem khawpui khi,
Lalna ram pangpar mawiin a bawm e;
Tah chuan an phaiphuleng an rem,
Hnehtu Lal lian an chawimawi e,
Fakna a dai ngai lo.
